Articles.Content: Hey guys, I'm looking for a certain mod. I saw it while back, but can't remember the name. It let you save parts of craft in VAB, then you could load it while building another. I remember it had purple-ish button with a puzzle piece. Can anybody tell me the name, please? Or any similar mods that have the same functionality. I need it so I can properly load payload to my freighter craft. Thanks

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/subassembly-saver-loader/ its broken for .20 though

BUT

there is a fix here
Oh thank you very much! This has saved my life!
